Posts.Content: Sometimes we know our bodies best. And I've found with all my many medical problems doctors have to be pushed. I'm dealing with a issue myself with my left breast with a bruise and a lump that won't go away and it is scary how relaxed doctors can be with something that can take your life. Do not feel like a hypochondriac. Take care of yourself Report
Posts.Title: inverted nipple & crazy dreams

Posts.Content: I am so sorry you are going through this. I don't have an answer to your question but I might be on the same path. I have yet to be dxed but am going through the steps of call back ultrasound etc. But I think I am in trouble, With the mets to the brain did you have symptoms ? I have developed a tremor on my right side . Didn't think much of it because both my parents had Parkinsons. But now with possible IBC I'm worried Report
Posts.Title: Stage 4 breast cancer metastecised to lungs, bones and now in brain.
